price: Nígbà tí ìwọ bá sì wo ibẹ̀ yẹn (nínú Ọgbà Ìdẹ̀ra), ìwọ yóò rí ìdẹ̀ra àti ọlá tó tóbi.
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَيۡتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيۡتَ نَعِيمٗا وَمُلۡكٗا كَبِيرًا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ra-ayta thamma ra-ayta naʿīman wamul'kan kabīran
